doc.field: Series I: Production Files is comprised of paper archives that relate to Collective: Unconscious's production of theatrical events. This series includes scripts for individual plays and festivals, proposals, publicity, and miscellaneous papers associated with the general production of artistic forms and materials relating to the rental of performance space. Also included are near-comprehensive show reports documenting the date, title, attendance and ticket price of various performances. The material has been arranged within four subseries:
Subseries A: General Subseries B: Programs, Press, and Promotional Subseries C: Scripts Subseries D: Publications/Source Material
